column2: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are using the most current and updated set of complete construction drawings
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Drawings and drawing registers
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
1.2 Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS & WP
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Unless specified otherwise, all fencing materials and products shall be supplied by the Contractor and shall be of the dimensions, manufacture, quality and structural grade in accordance with the requirements of SD3143 and IFC drawings.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Confirm footings are set out to locations specified on design drawings
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Concrete shall be of minimum strength N20
○ Concrete footing shall be 600mm x 200mm for all posts
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Posts shall be set in concrete footings of the dimensions shown on the drawings and set at the correct height governed by landscaped area FSL.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Post centres shall be placed at 2455 mm intervals as shown on drawing SD3143.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Personnel to ensure that work areas are clean and free of excess materials
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All material dockets and compliance certificates are to be provided to the client.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
